Title: Three Men and a Cradle
Actors: Roland Giraud, Michel Boujenah, André Dussollier, Philippine Leroy-Beaulieu
Plot: Jacques, Pierre, and Michel are three adult friends who enjoy single life until they find themselves stuck - with a baby.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 4 nominations.
Production: Flach Film, TF1 Films Production, Soprofilms [fr]
